## Quick Start

Create a universal React project with `expo-shake` setup:

### Installation

```bash
yarn add expo-shake expo-sensors
```

### Usage

Import the library into your project file:

```js
import * as Shake from 'expo-shake';
```

Demo

```ts
Shake.addListener(() => {
  alert('Undo Typing');
});

Shake.removeSubscription(() => {});
```
